channel.title: Moparscape offline
channel.description: [glow=red,2,300]can i run moparscape on a laptop offline like nobody in the server or its not connected with the internet???[/glow]

item.description:
@Rare_z wrote:

You donâ€™t need internet to play on 127.0.0.1 but you do need internet to play on private servers

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape offline
item.dc:creator: @Kingturd Kingturd
item.description:
@Kingturd wrote:

If by Nobodys in the server you mean that your in and nobody else is, your logged on to 127.0.0.1, the server for you to play by yourself on. If you mean it says every server is down, just keep trying. Sometimes this happens. If its the first one, just click on the Help tab on the top of Moparscape, and click Server Status. You will see a page with the names of servers, their IPs, and their Ports. If the port is 43594, just type in the IP to the IP slot on your Moparscape screen. If its something like 5555, just go to the File tab and hit New Port, then type in the Port.

Read full topic
